description: The price of Huawei Nova 4 is only BDT 45,990. Huawei Nova 4 brings some great features like Palm Cele, Wide Selfie, Beauty Mode, Quick Launch, Seal Flash, Game Tool, Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gear Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor. It’s a 4G tech dual-SIM smartphone. Huawei Nova 4 Aurora is available in blue, red, white and black colors. This is a 6.4 inch IPS LCD display with 1080 × 2310 resolution. The camera has 2 MP dual cameras with 48 MPs, 16 MPs and 22 Apertors. The front has a 25 MP camera with Selfie Focus. It is powered by 3750 mAh battery, which runs the Hisilicon Kirin 970 processor and offers 8 GB of RAM and 128 GB of ROM for a smooth display.

description: The expected price of Vivo NEX Dual Display is BDT 66,990 only. Vivo NEX Dual Display comes with some amazing features like Device Maintenance, Wide selfie, Beauty mode, Quick launch, Selfie flash, One hand mode, Accelerometer, Fingerprint Sensor, Gyro Sensor, Geomagnetic Sensor, Light Sensor, Proximity Sensor. It is a Dual-SIM smartphone with 4G technology. The Vivo NEX 2 Dual Display is available in Polar Blue colours. It has a 6.39 inch Super AMOLED display with 1080 x 2316 resolution. In the camera section 12 MP, 2 MP, TOF camera are on the back with 1.8 aperture. On the front, there is no camera. It is powered by a 3500 mAh battery which keeps the Qualcomm SDM845 Snapdragon 845 processor running and for a smooth performance a 10 GB RAM and 128 GB ROM is available.
